name: GPT4ALL Lora Q4
description: GPT4All, developed by Nomic AI, is a chatbot trained over an extensive corpus of assistant interactions. By finetuning LLaMA 7B, GPT4All provides an open-source ecosystem to train and deploy efficient, assistant-style large language models locally on consumer-grade CPUs. This democratized approach to AI aims to bolster open research, reproducibility, and promote developments in AI alignment and interpretability. The current model has been 4-bit quantized using ggml framework.
